structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: Any funds appropriated for the purpose of KRS 171.201 to 171.205 shall be expended for aiding in the establishment, extension and development of local public library services through the purchase, lease, or repair of library materials, equipment, furniture, buildings, or bookmobiles and for such other methods and services as will best accomplish the purpose. Funds shall be paid out by the State Treasurer on warrants drawn by the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet on order of the state librarian.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 241, sec. 3. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 1. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. VIII, sec. 4. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 3.
